name: Lexington
startIntroPart1: May your kingdom be admired, King Lexington III. You not be the smartest, or the fastest, but your people will prosper no matter their troubles. For that's what it means to be a Lexington.
startIntroPart2: Do you have what it takes make Lexington superior to all?
declaringWar: You are a threat to Lexington, you must be eradicated!
attacked: You've made a grave mistake, fool!
defeated: If you can beat me, then you truly deserve to rule this world
introduction: I'm King Lexington III, of the Lexington people, feel free to check out the town square, friend.
hateLetsHearIt: Quickly, I don't have time for you.
hateNo: Only a fool would accept that offer!
afterPeace: May we never make such a mistake again.
tradeRequest: I have an offer, how does it sound?
uniqueName: Money Makes The Earth Go Round
uniques: Free [Great Merchant] appears<upon founding a city>

name: Trenchon
startIntroPart1: You show no mercy, Torek Jirk. You're army and people will be writen about in history books for centuries, for your empire is the best.
startIntroPart2: You must take over quickly, or you will lose your chance to.
declaringWar: I hope to see your body rot among your people!
defeated: I'll see you in hell you pest
introduction: The name's Torek Trenchon, my empire is a gem, much like your's.
hateLetsHearIt: Be quick, I can't stand your voice.
hateNo: You'll be dead before I accept that!
afterPeace: Let us stop for now, we've gotten nowhere.
tradeRequest: Come on! Accept it, I swear it's fair!
uniques: [+20]% Gold cost of upgrading <after discovering [Iron Working]>

name: Earthorn
startIntroPart1: Peace to you, Eliot of Earthorn. You're land is one of beauty, and through your peaceful aditude you will be the greatest civilzation the world has ever known.
declaringWar: This is for the best... I'm sorry...
attacked: B-But, why? It doesn't matter, I'll keep Earthorn safe from you!
defeated: Congrats on besting me! Just don't forget to uphold your honor, for the sake of your people.
introduction: Hello friend, My name is Eliot! If you ever need aid just ask, alright?
neutralHello: Good day to you! Would you like some tea perhaps?
neutralLetsHearIt: Give me an idea of yours.
neutralYes: I like your way of thinking!
hateLetsHearIt: I'm busy so don't be long...
hateYes: For our people's sake I guess...
afterPeace: It's much better to live in harmony, peace is the most obvious choice.
uniques: When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [+50]% boost to great person generation
Gain [+2] [Culture] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>
Gain [+2] [Production] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>

name: Silexidor
startIntroPart1: King Silexidor, you may lead Silexidor anyway you please, for you are in control now.
declaringWar: You have gone to far, time to say goodbye!
attacked: Declaring war on me is pointless, soon you will beg for mercy.
defeated: W-What!? You defeated me?! So be it, congrats I guess...
introduction: I'm Sir Silexidor, I'm glad to see their are civilized folk out there. Let's keep in touch, mate.
hateLetsHearIt: Oh, need help from me? Pethetic...
uniques: [Great Scientist] is earned [+20]% faster <when not at war>
[Great General] is earned [+20]% faster <when at war>

name: The Silexidor Republic
startIntroPart1: Prince Dibian of Silexidor, you are a man of the people, going against your fathers wishes and building a new kingdom. One of peace, and prosparity.
startIntroPart2: Will you grow, or crumble among others?
declaringWar: We can't people like you if we want a peaceful life, time to die villan!
attacked: We won't hold back, not even our civilans are scared of you.
introduction: The name is Dib, I'm hoping to start a new kingdom, one of peace, and prosparity! Best wishes to ya!
hateHello: You best not say another word.
hateLetsHearIt: You expect me to help, YOU...
uniques: [+3 Science, +2 Production] in cities on [Plains] tiles

name: Xenlor Clan
startIntroPart1: Gorohiku, the wild leader of The Xenlor Clan, your methods of victory may be uncivilized, but they are effective. You will get your revenge on Lexington, and the whole world.
introduction: I'm Gorohiku of the Xenlor, hi...

civilopediaText.text: The Xenlor are a species that are part dragon, they often act like animals.

name: Xenlor Alliance
startIntroPart1: Yugi Uchiban, times have been tough for the remaining Xenlor, but you will bring peace between the races at all costs.
declaringWar: You people are evil, time for our revenge!
introduction: I go by Yugi, we Xenlor come in peace.
afterPeace: You've come to your senses, good.
tradeRequest: I would like to trade with you.

civilopediaText.text: The Xenlor have been supposedly dead but there was actully a few left, Yugi brought them togehter to start the clan once more, this time less violent.

name: Renaria
startIntroPart1: Great Princess Celica, with your impressive army you could take over whoever you please, but will you? The choice is yours.
declaringWar: Time to put our army to use, Laguz and I will show no mercy.
attacked: Have you seen our army? You tell pretty funny jokes.
defeated: W-What..? How c-could you beat the power of MY blade...?
introduction: Oh hello! I'm Celica, the sister of Prince Laguz The Great. You seem nice.
neutralHello: Good day to you! Did you need something in particular?
tradeRequest: Yo yo, I need something from you!
